src/entities/EnemyProjectile.ts.description: EnemyProjectile class follows PhotonTorpedo pattern with type-based configs. PROJECTILE_CONFIGS record maps EnemyType to speed/damage/color/size. Global window exposure pattern used for console tuning.

src/game/Game.ts.description: Enemy projectile collision detection implemented in checkEnemyProjectileCollisions(). Player is at origin (0,0,0) with 2.5 unit collision radius. Uses projectile.checkCollision() and gameState.applyEnemyDamage() for shield absorption and random system damage.
